meanings.definition: A plant of the pink family with sticky stems and leaves that trap insects.
meanings.sent1: The catchfly in the garden has sticky stems that catch bugs.
meanings.sent2: I saw a beautiful catchfly with pink flowers in the field.
meanings.sent3: The catchfly whispered to the insects, 'Come closer, my sticky trap awaits.'
meanings.sent4: The catchfly stood tall, a silent predator in the world of tiny creatures.
meanings.sent5: The catchfly's sticky embrace lured unsuspecting insects to their doom.

meanings.definition: A person or thing that catches flies.
meanings.sent1: The catchfly caught the pesky flies buzzing around the kitchen.
meanings.sent2: My grandmother always said she was the best catchfly in the house.
meanings.sent3: The catchfly, armed with a swatter, declared war on the flying pests.
meanings.sent4: The catchfly's quick reflexes made it the hero of the fly-infested room.
meanings.sent5: In the battle of man versus fly, the catchfly emerged victorious.
